actor_awards.notes: Renowned for his role as The Joker in the 1960s Batman TV series and film. He refused to shave his mustache for the role, covering it with white makeup. Dubbed the 'Latin from Manhattan'.

filmography.title: Batman: The Movie
filmography.role_description: The Clown Prince of Crime who teams up with Catwoman, The Penguin, and The Riddler to dehydrate the United Nations Security Council.
filmography.plot: The Dynamic Duo faces four supervillains who plan to hold the world for ransom with the help of a secret invention that instantly dehydrates people.

filmography.title: The Thin Man
filmography.role_description: A gigolo who becomes a suspect in the disappearance and murder investigation led by Nick and Nora Charles.
filmography.plot: A former detective and his wealthy wife investigate a murder case involving an eccentric inventor and his dysfunctional family.

filmography.title: Ocean's 11
filmography.role_description: A reformed gangster and rival who figures out the heist plan and tries to extort the group.
filmography.plot: Danny Ocean gathers a group of his World War II compatriots to pull off the ultimate Las Vegas heist.

filmography.title: The Little Princess
filmography.role_description: The kind Indian servant who secretly helps the mistreated Sara Crewe transform her attic room.
filmography.plot: A privileged girl is relegated to servitude at a boarding school when her father goes missing and is presumed dead.

filmography.title: Captain from Castile
filmography.role_description: The famous Spanish Conquistador whom the protagonist joins on an expedition to Mexico.
filmography.plot: A young Spanish officer flees the Inquisition and joins Cortez's expedition to the New World.

filmography.title: If a Man Answers
filmography.role_description: The wealthy father of the protagonist who gives her advice on how to train her husband like a dog.
filmography.plot: A young wife uses a dog training manual to shape her husband's behavior.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Supporting Actor

filmography.title: Wee Willie Winkie
filmography.role_description: A rebel leader in India who is charmed by the innocence of Shirley Temple's character.
filmography.plot: A young girl travels to British-controlled India to live with her stern grandfather and wins over the regiment.

filmography.title: Frontier Marshal
filmography.role_description: The legendary gambler and gunslinger who befriends Wyatt Earp.
filmography.plot: Wyatt Earp arrives in Tombstone to bring law and order, clashing with outlaws and befriending Doc Holliday.

filmography.title: Tales of Manhattan
filmography.role_description: A character in one of the anthology segments involving a cursed tailcoat.
filmography.plot: A black tailcoat passes through the hands of various owners, affecting their lives in different ways.

filmography.title: Around the World in 80 Days
filmography.role_description: One of Achmed Abdullah's henchmen in this star-studded epic.
filmography.plot: A Victorian Englishman bets that with the new steamships and railways he can circumnavigate the globe in eighty days.

filmography.title: Vera Cruz
filmography.role_description: A French officer involved in the conflict between the Mexican rebels and the Emperor.
filmography.plot: During the Mexican Rebellion of 1866, an American mercenary and an outlaw are hired to escort a countess to Vera Cruz.

filmography.title: Donovan's Reef
filmography.role_description: A French governor of a South Sea island who gets involved in the comedic conflicts of the locals.
filmography.plot: Three World War II veterans living on a French Polynesian island have their paradise disrupted when a daughter arrives.

filmography.title: The Good Fairy
filmography.role_description: A character who interacts with the naive protagonist in this Preston Sturges-scripted comedy.
filmography.plot: A naive usherette tries to help a waiter by manipulating a wealthy businessman, leading to romantic complications.

filmography.title: Orchestra Wives
filmography.role_description: The pianist of the band who is a friend and confidant to the band members.
filmography.plot: A young woman marries a trumpet player in a famous swing band and learns about the gossip and difficulties of life on the road.

filmography.title: Springtime in the Rockies
filmography.role_description: A Latin lover figure in this colorful musical set in the Canadian Rockies.
filmography.plot: A Broadway show's partners have a falling out, leading to a romantic pursuit at a Canadian resort.

filmography.title: Week-End in Havana
filmography.role_description: A charming gigolo in Havana who romances the main character.
filmography.plot: A shopgirl is sent on a vacation to Havana by a steamship company after her ship runs aground.

filmography.title: Tall, Dark and Handsome
filmography.role_description: A Chicago gangster who falls for a department store employee.
filmography.plot: A soft-hearted gangster tries to go straight but is pulled back into the underworld by a rival.

filmography.title: Coney Island
filmography.role_description: A smooth-talking showman who competes with his rival for a singer's affections.
filmography.plot: Two showmen compete for the affections of a singer in turn-of-the-century Coney Island.

filmography.title: The Computer Wore Tennis Shoes
filmography.role_description: A wealthy businessman and secret gangster who becomes the antagonist to the computer-enhanced student.
filmography.plot: A college student gets a computer brain after an accident and helps a gangster.

filmography.title: Now You See Him, Now You Don't
filmography.role_description: Romero reprises his role as the villainous A.J. Arno, who tries to steal an invisibility formula.
filmography.plot: A chemistry student discovers an invisibility spray, which a crook tries to steal.

filmography.title: The Strongest Man in the World
filmography.role_description: Arno returns again to exploit a super-strength formula.
filmography.plot: A science student accidentally creates a formula that gives him superhuman strength, attracting the attention of criminals.

filmography.title: Clive of India
filmography.role_description: A key Indian figure who conspires with Clive.
filmography.plot: A biographical film about Robert Clive, who secured India for the British Empire.

filmography.title: Show Them No Mercy!
filmography.role_description: One of the gangsters who holds a family hostage.
filmography.plot: A young couple and their baby are kidnapped by a gang of bank robbers.

filmography.title: Julia Misbehaves
filmography.role_description: An acrobat and friend of the main character.
filmography.plot: A showgirl returns to her estranged husband for their daughter's wedding and causes chaos.

filmography.title: Lost Continent
filmography.role_description: The leader of an expedition to recover a missing rocket, stumbling upon dinosaurs.
filmography.plot: An expedition is sent to the South Pacific to find a missing rocket, but they discover a prehistoric land filled with dinosaurs.

filmography.title: Wintertime
filmography.role_description: A hotel owner who tries to save his business with the help of a skating star.
filmography.plot: A Norwegian skating star tries to save a failing Canadian hotel from bankruptcy.

filmography.title: Marriage on the Rocks
filmography.role_description: A Mexican lawyer who accidentally divorces a couple and marries the wife to his friend.
filmography.plot: A bored couple goes to Mexico for a second honeymoon but ends up getting divorced by mistake.

filmography.title: Skidoo
filmography.role_description: A mob boss's associate in this psychedelic comedy.
filmography.plot: A retired hitman is forced back into duty by a mob boss to silence an informant in prison.

filmography.title: That Lady in Ermine
filmography.role_description: A character in this musical fantasy set in a castle.
filmography.plot: A countess tries to protect her castle from an invading colonel with the help of her ancestors' ghosts.

filmography.title: Public Enemy's Wife
filmography.role_description: A gangster who is jealous of his ex-wife's new relationship.
filmography.plot: A G-Man pretends to marry a gangster's ex-wife to trap him when he breaks out of prison.
